title: Affair With Stranger At Our Wedding - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Affair   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Broken Engagement   Clingy Lover   Cohabitation   Contracts   Female Protagonist   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience
author: 小蜜橘
description:
“Honey… Must you be engaged to her?” 

A man stood by the bed and pulled the chain off his pants in a hurry, “Yes, the marriage was the command of our parents. I could not disobey them. Baby, let’s hurry! The engagement starts in an hour…”

When my bestie and fiance were shown on the large screen at the engagement party, I became a joke…

So what, I will pay him injustice for his heartless!

I looked around for a week, 'Well! Here comes the target!'

“Hey! You! Will you marry me?”

He smiled slightly and followed a short silence, “Yes!”>
